org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanaccount.domain

Class LoanSummaryWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanaccount.domain.LoanSummaryWrapper

  • @Component
public final class LoanSummaryWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper for dealing with side-effect free functionality related to a loans transactions and repayment schedule.
